text: Grgeteg () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Irig municipality, in the Srem District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority among its population of 76 (2011 census). ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Syrmia Category:Serbia geography articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Grgeteg
